mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM base_ht_product_family AS bhpf LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON bhpf.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON bhpf.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bhpf.org_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(bhpf.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bhpf.product_family_code like CONCAT('%', #{productFamilyCode}, '%')
and bhpf.product_family_name like CONCAT('%', #{productFamilyName}, '%')
and bhpf.product_family_desc like CONCAT('%', #{productFamilyDesc}, '%')
and bhpf.status=#{status}
and bhpf.org_id=#{orgId}
order by modified_time desc
